item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Bin Laden offers a truce to Europe. Why aren't we in Afghanistan hunting this guy down? Instead, we're spending billions of dollars, hundreds of American lives, thousands of Iraqi lives and years in Iraq installing a democracy that is sure to be overthrown within a week after we leave. Al Qaeda is the real threat to democracy in the middle east, not some egotistical dork in Fallujah.
